subtitle: understanding the spiritual meaning of
the illness is a
process it is a quest an inner Journey
on which you gradually restore the
communication
process Panic that seizes you when you
are confronted with physical failure or
illness prevents you from opening up to
a broader perspective on

another light you might experience it as

to return to something precious that you
